Text: Thank you everyone who is downloading this right now.  This is my first upload so I hope I did not make any mistakes.  I plan to have one of the books available by January 28th if everything goes according to plan.  If anyone has ideas about what I can do better please post a comment or email me at dejima42@yahoo.com.  I can also go into more details on what I plan to do to make copies of the books if anyone wants to know more.
I actually bought a few of my math books from India.  I really wish there were better mathematicians in America or at least within our education system.

Thanks sephi09 for this upload.We in India refer quite a lot of books by American authors viz.Resnick Halliday,Thomas'Calculus,Stewart's Calculus,Beer Johnston etc.just to name a few and they are excellent whereas our Indian books are quite stale in comparison.All countries have some great teachers and many pathetic teachers.The story is the same everywhere.
this calculas stuff is outside my Maths-requirement but thanks for sharing.
